forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 68F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 66F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 62F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 19C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 66F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 18C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
